name: Organic Coffee Beans - Colombian Supreme
description: Single-origin organic coffee beans from Colombian highlands. Rich, full-bodied flavor with notes of chocolate and caramel.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Double-wall insulated stainless steel water bottle that keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. BPA-free and eco-friendly.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Sleek design with LED charging indicator.

name: Luxury Silk Pillowcase Set
description: 100% mulberry silk pillowcase set that promotes healthy hair and skin. Hypoallergenic and temperature regulating.

name: Professional Chef's Knife
description: High-carbon German steel chef's knife with ergonomic handle. Perfect balance and razor-sharp edge for precision cutting.

name: Smart Home Security Camera
description: 4K HD security camera with night vision, motion detection, and smartphone app control. Weather-resistant for indoor/outdoor use.

name: Bamboo Cutting Board Set
description: Sustainable bamboo cutting board set with three different sizes. Naturally antimicrobial and knife-friendly surface.

name: Gaming Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB backlit mechanical gaming keyboard with tactile switches and programmable macros. Built for competitive gaming.

name: Yoga Mat Premium Cork
description: Natural cork yoga mat with excellent grip and alignment guides. Eco-friendly, non-slip surface perfect for all yoga styles.

name: Smart LED Light Bulbs 4-Pack
description: WiFi-enabled smart LED bulbs with 16 million colors and voice control compatibility. Energy efficient and long-lasting.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Compact waterproof Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound and 20-hour battery life. Perfect for outdoor adventures.

name: Memory Foam Mattress Topper
description: Gel-infused memory foam mattress topper that provides pressure relief and temperature regulation for better sleep.

name: Ceramic Non-Stick Cookware Set
description: 10-piece ceramic non-stick cookware set that's PFOA-free and oven-safe up to 450Â°F. Even heat distribution.

name: Electric Toothbrush with UV Sanitizer
description: Advanced electric toothbrush with pressure sensor, multiple cleaning modes, and UV sanitizing base for optimal oral health.

name: Adjustable Laptop Stand
description: Aluminum adjustable laptop stand with excellent ventilation and ergonomic viewing angles. Compatible with all laptop sizes.

name: Essential Oil Diffuser Set
description: Ultrasonic essential oil diffuser with color-changing LED lights and timer settings. Includes starter set of 6 oils.

name: Resistance Bands Exercise Set
description: Complete resistance bands workout set with multiple resistance levels, door anchor, and exercise guide for full-body training.

name: Smart Thermostat
description: WiFi-enabled programmable thermostat with learning capabilities and energy usage reports. Control from anywhere via smartphone app.

name: Stainless Steel Kitchen Scale
description: Digital kitchen scale with precision weighing up to 11lbs. Tare function and multiple unit measurements for accurate cooking.

name: Wireless Car Charger Mount
description: Automatic clamping wireless car charger mount with fast charging and adjustable viewing angles. Compatible with all phone sizes.
